Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides circus skills classes for children and young people who want to specialize in static trapeze run by Greentop Circus (see separate entry). Taught by experienced circus tutors in a safe and friendly environment. Students will learn how to warm up safely, climb ropes, transfer to the trapeze bar, learn various moves and sequences as well as choreography and presentation skills. Students will also be taught how to use other aerial equipment such as silks, hoops and Corde Lisse. Each term concludes with an end of term show.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
